match: .*Unable to write data to the transport connection.*
comment: Intermittent disconnect which can happen at any time.

match: .*Failed creating event source: Blue Prism Resource \(.*\); error: System.Security.SecurityException: The source was not found, but some or all event logs could not be searched.*
comment: UAC prevents adding event sources, but the message is a warning and can be ignored.
Blue Prism Resource PC already started by external means.
Server Service does not connect to resource PC.

match: .*A Windows event log source could not be created for this resource PC.*
comment: Server Service does not connect to resource PC.
